glsa.title: X.org: libXpm vulnerability
glsa.synopsis: A new vulnerability has been discovered in libXpm, which is included in X.org, that can potentially lead to remote code execution.

background.p: libXpm is a pixmap manipulation library for the X Window System, included in X.org.

description.p: Chris Gilbert has discovered potentially exploitable buffer overflow cases in libXpm that weren't fixed in previous libXpm versions.

impact.p: A carefully-crafted XPM file could crash X.org, potentially allowing the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All X.org users should upgrade to the latest version:
